attributes.action: Training & arm ALL British police officers in line with the majority of Europe.
attributes.additional_details: It is now time for all British police officers to be fully trained and armed with a pistol inline with the majority of European police.
attributes.background:
We are all aware of the terrible incidents that have happened throughout Europe and in March 2017 another terror attack here at the heart of Parliament in London. 

Several innocent people have lost their lives including a police officer.
